resources.string: This is the Arakawa Tozan bus. This bus line is operated from March through November and requires a separate ticket.
Take the Matsubanda bus bound for the Shizenkan (Museum). Kotsu Bus passes cannot be used.
Transfer at the last stop (4:45). The next Arakawa Tozan bus departs at 5:00. This bus line is operated from March through November and requires a separate ticket.
Take the bus bound for the Shizenkan (Museum).
Transfer at the last stop (4:55). The next Arakawa Tozan bus departs at 5:00. This bus line is operated from March through November and requires a separate ticket.
Transfer at the last stop (5:13). The next Arakawa Tozan bus departs at 5:20. This bus line is operated from March through November and requires a separate ticket.
Take the bus bound for Anbo Port. It only runs when the first high-speed ferry leaves from Anbo, not from Miyanoura. For another bus:
Take the bus bound for Kurio-Bashi. It only runs on school days. For another bus:
Take the bus bound for Makino. It only runs on schools days. For another bus:
Take the bus bound for Kurio-Bashi.
Transfer at any stop from Miyanoua Port (08:00) onwards. The bus bound for Oko-no-Taki will depart in about 40 minutes.
Transfer at Anbo (08:39). The bus bound for Kigensugi departs at 09:20.
Transfer at Miyanoura Port (08:00). The Matsubanda bus to Shiratani will departs at 08:05. If you are using a Kotsu Buss pass, use the Kotsu bus to Shiratani that departs at 8:20.
Take the bus bound for Kigen Sugi.
Take the Matsubanda bus bound for Shiratani. Kotsu Bus passes cannot be used.
Take the bus bound for Shiratani.
Take the bus bound for Oko-no-Taki.
Transfer at Anbo (08:39). The bus bound for Kigensugi departs at 09:20.
Take the bus bound for Miyanoura Port.
Transfer at Oharamachi (09:25). The Matsubanda bus bound for the Shizenkan (Museum) departs at (09:34) in the opposite direction. Kotsu passes cannot be used.
Take the bus bound for Iwasaki Hotel.
Transfer at Oharamachi (09:25). The bus bound for Iwasaki-Hotel departs at 10:05 in the opposite direction.
Transfer at Oharamachi (09:25). The bus bound for Kurio-Bashi departs at 10:24 in the opposite direction.
Take the Matsubanda bus bound for Miyanoura Port. Kotsu Bus passes cannot be used.
Transfer at Makino (10:35). The bus bound for Iwasaki Hotel departs at 10:40.
Transfer at Makino (10:35). The bus bound for Kurio-Bashi departs at 11:03.
Transfer at any stop from Miyanoura Port (10:00) onwards. The bus bound for Kurio-Bashi departs in about 20 minutes.
Transfer at any stop from Miyanoura Port to Makino. The Matsubanda bus to the Shizenkan (Museum) will depart in 8~10 minutes. Kotsu Bus passes cannot be used.
Transfer at Miyanoura Port (10:00). The bus bound for Shiratani Unsuikyo will depart in 20 minutes.
Take the bus bound for GoChoMae.
Transfer at Makino (11:38). The bus bound for Kurio-Bashi departs at 11:58 in the opposite direction.
Transfer at any stop from Miyanoura Port to Makino. The Matsubanda bus to the Shizenkan (Museum) departs in about 15 minutes. Kotsu Bus passes cannot be used.
Transfer at the last stop (12:13). The Arakawa Tozan Bus departs at 13:00. This bus line is operated from March through November. Kotsu Bus passes cannot be used for either of these buses.
Transfer at Oharamachi (12:05). The bus bound for Iwasaki Hotel departs at 12:20 in the opposite direction.
Transfer at any stop from Miyanoura Port (12:15) onwards. The bus bound for Oko-no-Taki wil depart in about 35 minutes.
Transfer at any stop from Miyanoura Port (12:15) to Oharamachi (12:20). The bus bound for Shiratani Unsuikyo will depart in 95~100 minutes.

Transfer at any stop from Miyanoura Port to Makino. The Matsubanda bus to the Shizenkan (Museum) will depart in 25~30 minutes. Kotsu Bus passes cannot be used. *Make sure your bus matches your destination!*
Transfer at Anbo (12:57). The bus bound for Kigensugi departs at 13:33.
Transfer at Oharamachi (12:05). The bus bound for Oko-no-Taki departs at 12:55 in the opposite direction.
Transfer at the Shizenkan (Museum) (13:33). The bus bound for Kigensugi departs at 13:39.
Transfer at Anbo (13:32). The bus bound for Kigensugi departs at 13:33.
Transfer at any stop from Miyanoura Port (14:05) onwards. The bus for Oko-no-Taki will depart in about 75 minutes.
Transfer at any stop from Miyanoura Port (14:05) to Oharamachi (14:10). The bus bound for Shiratani Unsuikyo will depart in 85~90 minutes.
Transfer at any stop from Miyanoura Port to Makino. The Matsubanda bus to the Shizenkan (Museum) will depart in 38~40 minutes. Kotsu Bus passes cannot be used.
Transfer at Oharamachi (15:05). The bus bound for Oko-no-Taki departs at 15:30 in the opposite direction.
Transfer at Anbo (15:49). The bus bound for Oko-no-Taki departs at 16:05 in the opposite direction.
Transfer at any stop from Miyanoura Port (15:45) onwards. The bus bound for Kurio-Bashi will depart in about one hour.
Transfer at any stop from Miyanoura Port to Makino. The Matsubanda bus to the Shizenkan (Museum) will depart in 51~55 minutes. Kotsu Bus passes cannot be used.
Transfer at Oharamachi (16:35). The bus bound for Kurio-Bashi departs at 16:50 in the opposite direction.
This is the Arakawa Tozan bus. This bus line is operated from March through November and requires a separate ticket.
Transfer at the Shizenkan (17:35). The bus bound for Hirauchi Kaichu Onsen departs at 17:40.
Take the bus bound for Hirauchi Kaichu Onsen.
Transfer at any stop from Miyanoura Port (17:35) onwards. The bus bound for Kurio-Bashi will depart in about 30~33 minutes.
Transfer at Makino (18:25). The bus bound for Kurio-Bashi departs at 18:50.
Transfer at the Shizenkan (18:05) The Matsubanda bus bound for Miyanoura Port departs at 18:20. Kotsu Bus passes cannot be used.
Take the Matsubanda bus bound for the Airport. Kotsu Bus passes cannot be used.
